mapper.insert: insert into student(st_num, st_name, st_semester, st_state, st_pr_num) values(#{st_num}, #{st_name}, #{st_semester}, #{st_state}, #{st_pr_num})
mapper.select: select st_num, st_name, st_semester, st_state, st_pr_num from student
mapper.update: update student set st_name=#{st_name}, st_semester=#{st_semester}, st_state=#{st_state}, st_pr_num=#{st_pr_num} where st_num=#{st_num}
